title: Roast beetroots, apples and fennel
ingredients: ['5 medium beetroots, peeled and quartered', '5 apples, cored and chopped', '2 heads fennel, trimmed and thickly sliced', '175g honey and mustard salad dressing', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon sea salt', 'ground black pepper, to taste']
